original_text: Every male among the priests shall eat thereof: it shall be eaten in the holy place: it is most holy.
korean_text: 제사장인 남자는 모두 그것을 먹되 거룩한 곳에서 먹을지니라 그것은 지극히 거룩하니라

sentences.original_text: Every male among the priests shall eat thereof
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장들 중의 모든 남자는 그것을 먹을지니라

sentences.original_text: it shall be eaten in the holy place
